featured.text: Tsavo National park needed a baby elephant (B) she could not find her way home (C) she was very young when she lost her mother (D) Daphne wanted to keep her as a pet 48.
After a year in the orphanage with the constant companionship of her human family, Zoe was taken to a refuge at Tsavo National Park.
Daphne’s husband, David Sheldrick, founded Tsavo National Park.
At Tsavo National Park, Zoe has been ________.

definition.zh_def: 一個位於肯尼亞的國家公園，以其豐富的野生動物和壯觀的自然景觀而聞名。
definition.en_def: A national park in Kenya known for its rich wildlife and stunning natural scenery.
definition.example: Tsavo National Park is home to a diverse range of animals, including elephants and lions.
